A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a long time Star Wars fan there is so many issues with this movie. The plot was confusing and drawn out\, the characters sucked\, the humor was forced and out of place. How can people say this movie is even close to ESB. I'm all for making a different movie instead of a rehash from the OT\, but this was attrocious. I had to remind myself throughout that I was watching Star Wars and not Avengers or a Harry potter fan fiction.
